data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Matrouh, Egypt.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Matrouh, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Matrouh who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Matrouh, Egypt that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Matrouh, Egypt.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Berber, Siwa people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, guide seekers in Matrouh, Egypt to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Matrouh, Egypt and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Matrouh, Egypt has a population of 427,600.

We estimate Matrouh has 19,020 people who might know Jesus, 37,123 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 371,457 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 19,020 believers in the state of Matrouh with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

location.name: Matrouh
location.cities_list: Mersa Matruh, Sīdī Barānī, As Sallūm, Al ‘Alamayn, Siwa Oasis
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mersa Matruh (62,042), Sīdī Barānī (24,271), As Sallūm (14,393), Al ‘Alamayn (7,400), Siwa Oasis (7,000)
